name: dashbuilder
description: Complete New Relic Dashboard Builder Solution

scripts.test:connection: cd scripts && npm run cli -- schema discover-event-types
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd scripts && npm install && cd ../nrdot-nr1-app && npm install && cd ../orchestrator && npm install
scripts.experiment:list: cd scripts && npm run cli -- experiment list
scripts.experiment:run: cd scripts && npm run cli -- experiment run
scripts.experiment:create: cd scripts && npm run cli -- experiment create
scripts.experiment:results: cd scripts && npm run cli -- experiment results
scripts.experiment:status: cd scripts && npm run cli -- experiment status
scripts.experiment:compare: cd scripts && npm run cli -- experiment compare
scripts.experiment:quick: cd scripts && npm run cli -- experiment run cost-optimization-basic --duration 5
